: : Rodimus Prime : :
By now, Rodimus was holding Nightlight close to him, trying to comfort her.
Rodimus Prime: It's always possible that a spy infiltrated the base, and I have learned to trust instincts.
 "airly2000 <airly2002@...>" <airly2002@...> wrote:Nightlight:

Nightlight moved closed "I don't know why"said sofly and with 
fear "but somethign isn't all right here... I feel like someone in 
this base isn't that he or she seems... It's a strange feeling... I 
can't forget it"




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> The words shook Rodimus. He hadn't thought of this. Hydras and his 
feud was a deep, heated, long time rivalry. In one form or another 
they had fought for millions of years. Hydras would surely pinpoint 
any loved ones in Rodimus' life. He would have to keep Nightlight 
and the baby safe.
> Rodimus Prime: Well dont worry about it, love. We're all safe, and 
together.
> Spite his words there was evident worry and some anger on his face.
>  "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>" <airly2002@h...> wrote:Nightlight:
> 
> Nightlight moved close to rodimus and she continued touching 
kindly 
> her daughter while the baby  curled close to her mommy giggling 
and 
> purring.
> 
> "Well"said Nightlight "It was a strange nightmare, I saw in my 
> nightmare that a strange bot witha snake shape attack us, and 
caught 
> us, I saw that that snake sorround our baby, who was crying;  You 
> didn't move, it seems that you're incounceos... and I was caught 
and 
> the snake started to strngle me while I heard the snake laught, 
but 
> it was the laught of hydras...    "
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > 
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > Rodimus Prime: So, what did you see? If you want to talk about 
it.

> after she saw a rodimus said "it was a nightmare... what horrible 
it 
> was"
> >

her, 
> the baby moved closed to both and Nighlight touched kindly her 
baby, 
> who purred . Then Nightlight looked to Rodimus and started to 
relax.

over
